description:
The goal of this talk is to present the latest news in the PyPy world.
In particular, I will cover:

-  the current status of PyPy, including performance and compatibility
   w.r.t CPython

-  the status of NumPy and in general of the scientific stack: what
   works, what doesn’t, the speed and compatibility tradeoffs, etc.

-  the status Python 3 on PyPy
title: PyPy Status Update
